mapper.insert: insert into message (sender_id, sender_name, receiver_id, receiver_name, content, have_read, create_time) values (#{senderId}, #{senderName}, #{receiverId}, #{receiverName}, #{content}, #{haveRead}, now())
mapper.update: update message set sender_name = CASE WHEN sender_id = #{Id} THEN #{username} ELSE sender_name END, receiver_name = CASE WHEN receiver_id = #{Id} THEN #{username} ELSE receiver_name END where sender_id = #{Id} OR receiver_id = #{Id}
